name: @balena/balena-io-renovate-config
description: Shared renovate configuration and GitHub Action

scripts.test:hooks: npm run build && git diff --exit-code default.json
scripts.prepare: node -e "try { (await import('husky')).default() } catch (e) { if (e.code !== 'ERR_MODULE_NOT_FOUND') throw e }" --input-type module

author: Balena.io. <hello@balena.io>
